Documentation
Table of Contents

Obsoletions for 23.0

23.0

Type Name Description
Field XBRL XBRL feature will be discontinued
Method GetUnauthorizedErrorText Error texts should be defined per extension. In other words, define your own text constants.
Codeunit System.Integration.PowerBI."Power BI Embed Helper" This functionality has been replaced by the Power BI javascript library
Field "Is Selection Done" Use Report Upload Status instead to track the upload status.
Field "Should Retry" Use Report Upload Status instead to track the upload status.
Field "Needs Deletion" Use Report Upload Status instead to track the upload status.
Table System.Integration.PowerBI."Power BI Report Configuration" Use table Power BI Selected Elements instead. The new table supports multiple types of embedded elements.
Table System.Integration.PowerBI."Power BI User Configuration" Use table Power BI Context Settings instead. The new table does not require Profile ID, and supports multiple types of embedded elements.
Table System.Integration.PowerBI."Power BI User Status" Check if the user has a pending job queue entry for codeunit "Power BI Report Synchronizer" instead and use the status from the job queue.
Page System.Integration.PowerBI."Power BI Embedded Report Part" The SourceTable of this page will be changed to Power BI Displayed Element. Only filtering on the Context field is supported; that field will maintain the same field name.
Page System.Integration.PowerBI."Content Pack Setup Part" Instead, follow the Business Central documentation page "Building Power BI Reports to Display Dynamics 365 Business Central Data" available at https://learn.microsoft.com/en-gb/dynamics365/business-central/across-how-use-financials-data-source-powerbi
Page System.Integration.PowerBI."Content Pack Setup Wizard" Instead, follow the Business Central documentation page "Building Power BI Reports to Display Dynamics 365 Business Central Data" available at https://learn.microsoft.com/en-gb/dynamics365/business-central/across-how-use-financials-data-source-powerbi
Page System.Integration.PowerBI."Power BI Management" This page has been replaced by page 6323 "Power BI Element Card"
Page System.Integration.PowerBI."Power BI Report Dialog" This page has been replaced by page 6323 "Power BI Element Card"
Method EditWorksheetInExcel Replaced by EditinExcelHandler.EditPageInExcel(PageCaption: Text[240]; ObjectId: Integer; CodeUnit "Filters")
Table System.Security.AccessControl."Permission Buffer" Table will be moved to temporary
Table System.Security.AccessControl."Plan Permission Set" No longer used.
PermissionSet System.Security.AccessControl."M365 COLLABORATION" No longer used.
Field ServerFilePath Replaced by usage of the File Content field.
Field "Target Field Caption" Redesigned to a new field "Target Table Field Calcucation"
Field "Recovery Task Id" The recovery job is no longer needed.
Field "Processed by User ID" The Processed by User ID is the same as User ID
Field XML Use codeunit Temp Blob instead.
Method RoutingCostPerUnit Replaced by procedure CalcRoutingCostPerUnit()
Method RoutingCostPerUnit Replaced by procedure CalcRoutingCostPerUnit()
Method CalcCostTime Replaced by procedure CalculateCostTime()
Method FindItemDescription Use another implementation of FindItemDescription.
Field "Item Cross References" Replaced with parameter Item References
Field "Item Cross References" Replaced with parameter Item References
Field "Coupled to CRM" Replaced by flow field Coupled to Dataverse
Field "Coupled to CRM" Replaced by flow field Coupled to Dataverse
EnumValue Subsidiary Value Subsidiary is unused.
Method SetNonDeductibleVAT Replaced with SetNonDeductibleVAT
Method Update Replaced with UpdateNonDeductibleAmountsInInvoicePostingBuffer
Method Update Replaced with UpdateAmount
Method Reverse Replaced with Reverse
Method Increment Replaced with Increment
Method ClearNonDeductibleVAT Replaced with ClearNonDedVATInInvoicePostingBuffer
Method Calculate Replaced with Calculate
Method Copy Replaced with Copy
Method Copy Replaced with Copy
Method AdjustRoundingForInvoicePostBufferUpdate Replaced with AdjustRoundingForInvoicePostingBufferUpdate
Method ApplyRoundingForFinalPostingFromInvoicePostBuffer Replaced with ApplyRoundingForFinalPostingFromInvoicePostingBuffer
Method InsertNewLine Replaced with InsertNewLine with NonDeductibleVATPct parameter
Table Microsoft.Finance.XBRL."XBRL Comment Line" XBRL feature will be discontinued
Table Microsoft.Finance.XBRL."XBRL G/L Map Line" XBRL feature will be discontinued
Table Microsoft.Finance.XBRL."XBRL Line Constant" XBRL feature will be discontinued
Table Microsoft.Finance.XBRL."XBRL Linkbase" XBRL feature will be discontinued
Table Microsoft.Finance.XBRL."XBRL Rollup Line" XBRL feature will be discontinued
Table Microsoft.Finance.XBRL."XBRL Schema" XBRL feature will be discontinued
Table Microsoft.Finance.XBRL."XBRL Taxonomy" XBRL feature will be discontinued
Table Microsoft.Finance.XBRL."XBRL Taxonomy Label" XBRL feature will be discontinued
Table Microsoft.Finance.XBRL."XBRL Taxonomy Line" XBRL feature will be discontinued
Field "Background Error Check" Replaced with GLSetup.Enable Data Check
Method ShowWSDeprecationNotication This deprecation warning should no longer be shown with from 23.0
Field "Invoice Posting Setup" Replaced by direct selection of posting interface in codeunits.
Field "Coupled to CRM" Replaced by flow field Coupled to Dataverse
Method InteractionFax Fax is not supported anymore.
Method ConvertCorrespondenceType Correspondence Type Fax is obsolete and will be removed.
Method CheckCorrespondenceType Correspondence Type Fax is no longer supported. This procedure only checked for Fax.
EnumValue Fax Not supported since moving to WebClient.
Field "Coupled to CRM" Replaced by flow field Coupled to Dataverse
Field VendorNo Use the field RecId instead
Field "Coupled to CRM" Replaced by flow field Coupled to Dataverse
Table Microsoft.EServices.EDocument."Document Service Cache" No longer required
Enum Microsoft.EServices.EDocument."Doc. Service Conflict Behavior" Replaced with "Doc. Sharing Conflict Behavior" in System Application.
Method GetItemFromItemRef Use another implementation of GetItemFromItemRef.
Method GetLegalOffice The procedure is not used and will be obsoleted
Method GetLegalOfficeLbl The procedure is not used and will be obsoleted
Method GetCustomGiro The procedure is not used and will be obsoleted
Method GetCustomGiroLbl The procedure is not used and will be obsoleted
Field "IC Partner Code" Replaced by the same field from "IC Setup" table.
Field "IC Inbox Type" Replaced by the same field from "IC Setup" table.
Field "IC Inbox Details" Replaced by the same field from "IC Setup" table.
Field "Auto. Send Transactions" Replaced by the same field from "IC Setup" table.
Field "Coupled to CRM" Replaced by page control Coupled to Dataverse
Field "Coupled to CRM" Replaced by page control Coupled to Dataverse
Field "Coupled to CRM" Replaced by page control Coupled to Dataverse
Field "Coupled to CRM" Replaced by flow field Coupled to Dataverse
Field "Dynamics NAV OData URL" This functionality is replaced with new item availability job queue entry.
Field "Dynamics NAV OData Username" This functionality is replaced with new item availability job queue entry.
Field "Dynamics NAV OData Accesskey" This functionality is replaced with new item availability job queue entry.
Codeunit Microsoft.Integration.Dataverse."CDS Set Coupled Flag" Replaced by flow fields Coupled to Dataverse
Codeunit Microsoft.Integration.Dataverse."CDS Set Coupled Flags" Replaced by flow fields Coupled to Dataverse
Method SetCoupledFlag This functionality is replaced with flow fields Coupled to Dataverse.
Method SetCoupledFlag This functionality is replaced with flow fields Coupled to Dataverse.
Method SetCoupledFlag This functionality is replaced with flow fields Coupled to Dataverse.
Codeunit Microsoft.Integration.Dataverse."Rebuild Dataverse Coupling Tbl" After the deprecation of Integration Record table, this codeunit can no longer be used. To rebuild the coupling table, install the extension that is uploaded here https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2245902
Table Microsoft.Integration.Graph."Graph Business Setting" This functionality is out of support
Table Microsoft.Integration.Graph."Graph Subscription" This functionality is out of support
Field "Optimize low-level code calc." Codeunit Calc. Low-level code is obsolete. Use Codeunit Low-Level Code Calculator instead.
Method IsJobSimplificationAvailable This method always returns true. Remove this method.
Method CreateSalesInvoiceLines Replaced by CreateSalesInvoiceLines(JobNo: Code[20]; var JobPlanningLineSource: Record "Job Planning Line"; InvoiceNo: Code[20]; NewInvoice: Boolean; PostingDate: Date; DocumentDate: Date; CreditMemo: Boolean)
Method CreateSalesInvoiceJobTask Replaced by CreateSalesInvoiceJobTask(var JobTask2: Record "Job Task"; PostingDate: Date; DocumentDate: Date; InvoicePerTask: Boolean; var NoOfInvoices: Integer; var OldJobNo: Code[20]; var OldJobTaskNo: Code[20]; LastJobTask: Boolean)
Method GetCreditMemoNo Replaced by GetCreditMemoNo(var Done2: Boolean; var NewCreditMemo2: Boolean; var PostingDate2: Date; var DocumentDate2: Date; var CreditMemoNo2: Code[20])

Field "Coupled to CRM" Replaced by flow field Coupled to Dataverse

Field "Batch Archiving Quotes" The field is part of the removed functionality.

Method GetAdditionalDocRefInfo Replaced by same procedure with additional parameter ProcessedDocType
Method GetLegalMonetaryInfo Replaced by GetLegalMonetaryInfo with TempSalesLine parameter for invoice rounding.
Field "Coupled to CRM" Replaced by flow field Coupled to Dataverse
Field "Coupled to CRM" Replaced by flow field Coupled to Dataverse
Method FindReservationEntry WhseItemTrackingSetup is a global variable, so there is no need to pass it as an argument
